animals.name: Elephant
animals.funFact: Elephants are the world's largest land animal!

animals.name: Lion
animals.funFact: Lions are known as 'kings of the jungle', but they actually live in grasslands and plains.

animals.name: Kangaroo
animals.funFact: Kangaroos use their powerful hind legs to move around and their tail for balance.

animals.name: Panda
animals.funFact: Pandas are famous for their love of bamboo, which makes up 99% of their diet.

animals.name: Dolphin
animals.funFact: Dolphins are highly intelligent and social marine mammals.
